TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1233

barker_notes.barker_summary: Contract to hire slaves to J. E. B. Austin, November 14, 1825.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1233

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Contract to hire slaves to J. E. B. Austin, November 14, 1825.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Be it Known that I *person_mentioned*John Randon*/person_mentioned* have this day hired to *person_mentioned*J. B. Austin*/person_mentioned* two *person_mentioned*negros*/person_mentioned* for *date_mentioned n="11-14-1826">one year from the twenty first day of this month*/date_mentioned* at the following rates to say, the *person_mentioned*negro man Frank*/person_mentioned* for the sum of one hundred and fifteen Dollars a year and the *person_mentioned*negro woman Hannah*/person_mentioned* for the sum of Sixty Dollars pr. year which sums are to be discounted with *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* in payment of my *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*procured of him*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="11-14-1825">Nov. 14. 1825*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*John Randon*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*It is understood that My *person_mentioned*negro Adam*/person_mentioned* is to go in the place of *person_mentioned*Frank*/person_mentioned* untill I get my *location_mentioned*Cabbins */location_mentioned*built say *date_mentioned n="12-14-1825">one month from this day*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*John Randon*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
